entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 a.m. MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blizzard developing overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
